item.title: Analyzing Parallelization of Attention
item.description: We exploit the inherent parallelism in the multi-head attention operation to partition the self-attention block (shown in Figure 5b).

item.title: Analysis of Transformer Model
item.description: This post analyzes transformer models, specifically memory and computation overhead.

item.title: Parallelism in Distributed Deep Learning
item.description: Distributed deep learning refers to use a distributed system that includes several workers to perform inference or training deep learning.
